column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My friend let them know ahead of time that I was vegan
column2: and they made a totally separate vegan menu for me
column5: and dessert. All of the dishes were on par with the non-vegan dishes
column6: and some even tastier according to my friends. Overall very pleasantly surprised
column7: really appreciate how much effort they put into not only making vegan options
column8: but making them with as much concern for taste and quality as their other dishes. Now they just need to have a permanent vegan menu available! :)
